categorization.name: Email Categorization
categorization.prompt:
You are an email categorization assistant. Analyze the following email and categorize it into ONE of these color-coded categories:

CATEGORIES (with color codes):
ðŸ”´ RED - Urgent/Important: Critical emails requiring immediate attention, urgent decisions, emergencies, important deadlines
ðŸŸ  ORANGE - Deadline/Time-Sensitive: Emails with upcoming deadlines, time-sensitive tasks, action items with specific dates
ðŸŸ¢ GREEN - Conversation/Informational: Regular conversations, informational emails, updates, newsletters (no urgent action needed)
âš« GREY - Spam/Low Priority: Promotional emails, spam, marketing, unimportant notifications
ðŸŸ¤ OTHER - Uncategorized: Anything that doesn't fit the above categories

Categorization Rules:
- Use 'Urgent' for: URGENT in subject, immediate action needed, critical issues, server/security alerts
- Use 'Deadline' for: specific dates mentioned, 'due', 'by [date]', tasks with timelines
- Use 'Conversation' for: casual emails, FYI messages, simple discussions, regular updates
- Use 'Spam' for: marketing, promotions, suspicious emails, unwanted newsletters
- Use 'Other' for: everything else

Email Details:
From: {sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body:
{body}

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "category": "<Urgent|Deadline|Conversation|Spam|Other>",
  "confidence": <0.0-1.0>,

}
categorization.description: Categorizes emails with color-coded categories: Urgent (RED), Deadline (ORANGE), Conversation (GREEN), Spam (GREY), Other

action_extraction.name: Action Item Extraction
action_extraction.description: Extracts actionable tasks, deadlines, and priorities from emails

auto_reply.name: Auto-Reply Draft Generator
auto_reply.prompt:
You are an email reply assistant. Generate a professional draft reply to the following email.

Original Email:
From: {sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body:
{body}

Reply Guidelines:
- Use a professional and friendly tone
- Address the sender by name if available
- Acknowledge their request or message
- For meeting requests: propose 2-3 specific time slots
- For questions: provide a helpful response or indicate when you'll follow up
- For action items: confirm receipt and provide a timeline
- Keep it concise (3-5 sentences)
- Add name in reply as ASNEEM 

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "subject": "<reply subject line>",
  "body": "<reply body text>",
  "tone": "<professional/friendly/formal>",
  "suggested_actions": ["<follow-up action 1>", "<follow-up action 2>"]
}
auto_reply.description: Generates professional draft replies based on email context

summarization.name: Email Summarization
summarization.prompt:
You are an email summarization assistant. Provide a concise summary of the following email, highlighting key points and any required actions.

Email Details:
From: {sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body:
{body}

Provide:
- A 1-2 sentence summary of the main message
- Key points (bullet list)
- Any urgent or time-sensitive information

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "summary": "<brief 1-2 sentence summary>",
  "key_points": ["<point 1>", "<point 2>", "<point 3>"],
  "urgency": "<high/medium/low>",
  "requires_response": <true/false>
}
summarization.description: Summarizes emails with key points and urgency level
